feed.title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Tue Jun 25 2024 - Tue Jul 02 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
entry.content:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Jul 02 2024

Summary of BCD changes from Tuesday, 25 June 2024 to Tuesday, 2 July 2024

Added Features: 15

Expand to see the full list...

api

  1. api ➞ Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_ethereum
  2. api ➞ createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ from-image
  3. api ➞ createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ none

html

  1. html ➞ manifest ➞ display_override ➞ tabbed

http

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Priority

svg

  1. svg ➞ elements ➞ animate ➞ href
  2. svg ➞ elements ➞ animateMotion ➞ href
  3. svg ➞ elements ➞ animateTransform ➞ href
  4. svg ➞ elements ➞ image ➞ href
  5. svg ➞ elements ➞ linearGradient ➞ href
  6. svg ➞ elements ➞ mpath ➞ href
  7. svg ➞ elements ➞ script ➞ href
  8. svg ➞ elements ➞ set ➞ href

webextensions

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScripts ➞ register ➞ matchOriginAsFallback
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ RegisteredContentScript ➞ matchOriginAsFallback

Removed Features: 37

Expand to see the full list...

api

  1. api ➞ Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_etherium

html

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ iframe ➞ external_protocol_urls_blocked
  2. html ➞ elements ➞ track ➞ src ➞ settable_src

http

  1. http ➞ status ➞ 100
  2. http ➞ status ➞ 200
  3. http ➞ status ➞ 201
  4. http ➞ status ➞ 204
  5. http ➞ status ➞ 206
  6. http ➞ status ➞ 301
  7. http ➞ status ➞ 302
  8. http ➞ status ➞ 303
  9. http ➞ status ➞ 304
  10. http ➞ status ➞ 307
  11. http ➞ status ➞ 401
  12. http ➞ status ➞ 403
  13. http ➞ status ➞ 404
  14. http ➞ status ➞ 406
  15. http ➞ status ➞ 407
  16. http ➞ status ➞ 408
  17. http ➞ status ➞ 409
  18. http ➞ status ➞ 410
  19. http ➞ status ➞ 412
  20. http ➞ status ➞ 416
  21. http ➞ status ➞ 418
  22. http ➞ status ➞ 451
  23. http ➞ status ➞ 500
  24. http ➞ status ➞ 501
  25. http ➞ status ➞ 502
  26. http ➞ status ➞ 503
  27. http ➞ status ➞ 504

svg

  1. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ color-profile
  2. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ enable-background
  3. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ href
  4. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ kerning
  5. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ solid-color
  6. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ solid-opacity
  7. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ xml_base

Implementation Status Changes: +5, -0

Added (5)

html

  1. html ➞ manifest ➞ display_override ➞ tabbed
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

http

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Priority
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

svg

  1. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ font-size-adjust
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ image-rendering
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ pointer-events
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
